DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate short-term effect technology base weight reduction program obese ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) adult primary care office .
DOC.brief_title: The Short-Term Effect Technology Driven Weight Control ( SMART ) Program Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participant age 1865 year . 2 . Participant BMI ( Body Mass Index > 30.0 kg/m2 ) 3 . Have access use email minimum 2days per week . 1 . Participant pregnant lactating : Weight loss recommend pregnant woman extra energy requirement essential fetal development ( Butte , Wong , Treuth , Ellis , & O'Brian Smith , 2004 ; Durnin , 1991 ) . 2 . Participant currently participate structured/selfhelp weight loss program . The elimination individual actively participate current weight loss program reduce potential carryover effect weight loss modality ( FifeShaw , 2006 ) . 3 . Participant attempt weight loss past 3 month . Same number two .
